findings.title: W1: Lack of data validation in the constructor
findings.description: The contract Safe4337Module does not perform any data validation inside the constructor.

findings.title: W2: Usage of solc optimizer
findings.description: Enabling solc optimizer may lead to unexpected bugs.

findings.title: I1: Naming convention does not follow ERC-4337 standard
findings.description: The function validateUserOp does not follow ERC-4337 standard naming convention.

findings.title: I2: Missing underscore in the internal function
findings.description: The function validateSignatures is internal, but it does not contain an underscore in its name.

findings.title: I3: Contract name is not equal to file name
findings.description: The contractâ€™s name is Safe4337Module; however, the name of the solidity file is EIP4337Module.sol.

findings.title: I4: Contract does not allow to specify validAfter and validUntil parameters
findings.description: The contract always returns 0 for both validAfter and validUntil parameters, which may limit the flexibility of the wallet.

findings.title: I5: Incorrect documentation
findings.description: The code snippet in the README.md file contains mistakes in the abi.encodeWithSignature format.
